name: Energia da Biomasse Solide
goal: The Association is inspired by the ideals of democracy and environmental sustainability; pursues educational, cultural, social, educational and promotion purposes of initiatives related to the sphere of the world of renewable sources and, in particular, of energy production from solid biomass
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy
euInitiatives: EBS is intrested in Renewable Sources Promotion Policies and Activities
